_header: A lord king of might that leaven wouldst thy might
_description: Irregular rhyming lines in Rolle’s Meditations on the Passion (Text A only) — ten and four lines

CULLl18.First Lines:
A lord king of myȝt þat leuyn woldust þi
                    myȝt& os vnmyȝty become my wrongys to
                    ryȝt…
CULLl18.Last Lines:
…And stoppyth al þe sauoure þat I may nouȝt the
                    feleþat so schamely haue ben þi tretoure vntrewe
CULLl18.Note: Ten lines, aabcbcddef, written as prose.
